Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the practice of surge pricing by chain restaurants
Summary: Prohibits food or beverage service establishments that are part of a chain with fifteen or more locations nationally from implementing surge pricing; provides exceptions; imposes a penalty.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the practice of surge pricing by chain restaurants
